Class Railway

java.lang.Object
train.Railway
public class Railway extends Object
Représentation d'un circuit constitué d'éléments de voie ferrée : gare ou section de voie
Author:
Fabien Dagnat invalid input: '<'fabien.dagnat@imt-atlantique.fr>, Philippe Tanguy invalid input: '<'philippe.tanguy@imt-atlantique.fr> Authors of the new implementation, Othmane EL AKRABA invalid input: '<'othmane.el-akraba@imt-atlantique.net>, Soufiane LACHGUER invalid input: '<'soufiane.lachguer@imt-atlantique.net>

  • Constructor Details

    • Railway

      public Railway(Element[] elements)
      Constructor that initializes a railway with an array of elements subrailways and stations
      Parameters:
      elements - Elements of the railway (must not be null)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the entered array is null

  • Method Details

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the length of the railway (via counting the elements that compose it)
      Returns:
      length of the railway

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex(Element e)
      Return the index (order) of an element in a railway. If the element doesn't exist in the railway, it returns -1 instead.
      Parameters:
      e - Element in a railway
      Returns:
      The index of a railway (if it exists in the railway), else -1

    • getElement

      public Element getElement(int index)
      Returns an element of the railway corresponding to the index given. If the index doesn't exist, it returns a null element.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of an element in the element
      Returns:
      The element corresponding to the index (or null if no such index exist)

    • initStations

      public void initStations()
      Method that initializes the stations linked to a railway. It sees all the elements of a railway and extracts the stations in its own List

    • setSubRailways

      public void setSubRailways()
      Method that creates new subrailways based on the elements of a railway, using stations as delimiters of each subrailway

    • getSubRailways

      public SubRailway[] getSubRailways()
      Return the list of subrailways of a railway.
      Returns:
      The list of subrailways of a railway.

    • getSubRailway

      public SubRailway getSubRailway(Element p)
      Returns the subrailway that an element belongs to, else throws an IllegalStateException if it doesn't exist in the railway or in any subrailway
      Parameters:
      p - the element that we want to get the subrailway of
      Returns:
      The subrailway on which the element exist
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the element doesn't exist in the railway or in any subrailway

    • getStations

      public Element[] getStations()
      Return the list of stations of a railway.
      Returns:
      The list of stations of a railway.

    • allTrainsInStations

      private boolean allTrainsInStations()
      Method that checks whether all trains are in a station (via seeing if a section is occupied or not).
      Returns:
      a Boolean that checks whether all trains are in a station or not

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Method that encodes the elements of the railway on a String
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String that lists the elements of the railway
